name: Stellar Bulwark
description:
You are a small ship facing never-ending waves of enemies. Survive long enough, and a mothership will appear to deal with you. Kill enemies to increase your score, and try to get as high of a score as possible, but the waves will get harder the longer you last.

This is just a small game that started as an experiment with making black and white sprites. It takes about 5 minutes to see all of the content if you don't die, but enemies are randomly generated and increase in difficulty, so it can be played for much longer. I hope you enjoy playing.

Controls

Press SHOOT to advance through menus.

Hold SHOOT to fire, or tap rapidly to fire faster.

Any type of gamepad should work, but only the first one will be recognized.
